title: Mobile Sweepstakes
subtitle: Engage your on the go customers with this mobile + social contest app.
bells_whistles: The mobile sweepstakes app makes it a snap to design and deploy a promotion that works seamlessly across both mobile devices and desktop browsers. This mobile app allows you to run an effective promotion across all social networks and browsers.

features.title: Be Everywhere
features.description: This mobile sweeps app helps brands take advantage of all possible consumer touch points from online to offline.

features.title: Custom (Secure) Entry Forms
features.description: Capture your customers interest and excitement with fully customizeable entry forms and a secure entry management and instant response (email) system. Custom entry form creation is included with all mobile apps.

features.title: Social Diversity
features.description: This app enables brands to publish and promote their contest or sweepstakes across multiple social networks with a single set up, and a single location for entry management.
